title: Service Channels

limit.title: Channel limit reached
limit.message: You have reached the limit of {{limit}} channels for your current plan. To add more channels, upgrade your plan.

noChannelsDescription: Channels allow you to connect with your customers through different platforms. Create your first channel to get started.

form.name: Channel Name
form.messageSignatureHelp: Use {{nickname}} to automatically insert the agent's name

email.passwordHint: For Gmail, use an app password
email.error: Failed to connect to email server

whatsapp.continueInstructions: Click the button above to retry the setup from the last step.
whatsapp.customConnectionDescription: Configure your own WhatsApp connection using your API credentials.
whatsapp.customizeExamplesHelp: Define custom examples for your template variables. These examples will be used in the preview and sent to WhatsApp.
whatsapp.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this channel? This action cannot be undone.
whatsapp.deleteTemplateConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
whatsapp.disconnectConfirmation: Are you sure you want to disconnect WhatsApp?
whatsapp.disconnectWarning: Are you sure you want to disconnect WhatsApp? It will require a new QR code to reconnect.
whatsapp.editExamplesHelp: Define custom examples for your template variables.
whatsapp.editTemplateWarning: Warning: Editing approved templates may cause issues with the WhatsApp API. Use with caution.
whatsapp.error: Failed to connect to WApi server
whatsapp.exampleHelp: Provide an example to help with template approval
whatsapp.fixVariableErrors: Fix the errors in variables before continuing
whatsapp.interflowConnectionDescription: Use our managed connection for a simpler and faster configuration.
whatsapp.interflowSetupDescription: Configure your WhatsApp connection using Interflow.
whatsapp.invalidHost: Invalid host format. Use format: host10.serverapi.dev
whatsapp.limitBODY: Body: maximum 1024 characters and multiple variables
whatsapp.limitButtons: Buttons: maximum 3 buttons (Quick Reply, URL or Phone)
whatsapp.limitContent: The template must contain at least one text component
whatsapp.limitEdits: The template cannot be edited after being approved
whatsapp.limitName: The template name must contain only lowercase letters and underscores (_)
whatsapp.newConnectionWarning: Attention: Inserting new settings will replace the existing credentials. It is necessary to test before saving.
whatsapp.noTemplatesDescription: You don't have any templates yet. Create your first template to send structured messages.
whatsapp.noVariablesFound: No variables found in this component.
whatsapp.parameterFormatHelp: Select the parameter format for the template
whatsapp.processingStarted: Processing started. Wait for status updates.
whatsapp.processingStep: Processing step: {step}. Wait for status updates.
whatsapp.resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the connection? This will require a new QR code.
whatsapp.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code in WhatsApp to connect
whatsapp.templateNameError: The template name must contain only lowercase letters and underscores (_)
whatsapp.templateNameHelp: Use only lowercase letters and underscores. Example: my_template_name
whatsapp.templatesDescription: Manage message templates for your WhatsApp Business channel
whatsapp.tokenInfo: Valid token for user {name}. Expires at: {expiresAt}
whatsapp.tokenMissingPermissions: Warning: The token does not have all the necessary permissions. Missing permissions: {permissions}
whatsapp.tokenPlaceholder: Enter your WhatsApp Business account token
whatsapp.variableExamplesHelp: Provide examples for each variable you used in the template. These examples will be used for template approval.
whatsapp.variablesMustBeSequential: Variables must follow a sequence ({{1}}, {{2}}, {{3}}, etc.)
whatsapp.verifyingToken: Verifying token. Wait for status updates.
whatsapp.waitingQrCode: Initializing connection, waiting for QR code...
whatsapp.24HourWindow: The 24-hour response window has expired. Use a template to send a new message.
whatsapp.fillAllVariables: Fill in all variables before sending
whatsapp.createTemplateFirst: You need to create and have approved templates before you can send them.
whatsapp.namePlaceholder: Enter WhatsApp channel name. Ex: Main Support

migration.title: Migration to New Version
migration.description: This channel was created with an older version of the API. To access new features and better performance, we recommend migrating to the new version.
migration.success: Channel successfully migrated to the new version!

callSettings.title: Call Settings
callSettings.rejectCallsDescription: When enabled, incoming calls will be automatically rejected and a message will be sent
callSettings.rejectCallsMessagePlaceholder: Enter the message to be sent when a call is rejected...
callSettings.rejectCallsMessageHelp: This message will be automatically sent when a call is rejected
callSettings.defaultRejectMessage: Hello! Please note that we are not accepting calls through this WhatsApp number. To ensure faster and more organized service, we are prioritizing contact via messages. Feel free to send texts or voice notes, whichever you prefer!

descriptions.whatsapp_official: Official integration with WhatsApp Business API
descriptions.whatsapp_wapi: WhatsApp integration via WApi - Multiple sessions support
descriptions.whatsapp_zapi: WhatsApp integration via ZApi - Managed and stable API
descriptions.whatsapp_evo: WhatsApp integration via Evolution API - Open source solution

errors.testRequired: Channel must be tested before activation
errors.connectionRequired: WhatsApp must be connected before activating
errors.invalidWhatsAppNumber: The provided number is not a valid WhatsApp

delete.title: Remove Channel
delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove channel {{name}}?

error.hasChats: Cannot delete channel with existing chats
